mapper.insert: insert into tapprovalrecord (sTransactionNum, sApprovelResult, sApprovelOpinion, sApprovelUserCode, sApprovelUserName) values (#{stransactionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapprovelresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapprovelopinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapprovelusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sapprovelusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tapprovalrecord set sTransactionNum = #{stransactionnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sApprovelResult = #{sapprovelresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sApprovelOpinion = #{sapprovelopinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sApprovelUserCode = #{sapprovelusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sApprovelUserName = #{sapprovelusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sApprovelTime = #{sapproveltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sID, sTransactionNum, sApprovelResult, sApprovelOpinion, sApprovelUserCode, sApprovelUserName, sApprovelTime from tapprovalrecord where sID = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select sID, sTransactionNum, sApprovelResult, sApprovelOpinion, sApprovelUserCode, sApprovelUserName, sApprovelTime from tapprovalrecord
select sApprovelResult , sApprovelOpinion, sApprovelUserCode, sApprovelUserName from tapprovalrecord where sTransactionNum = #{transactioinNum} order by sApprovelTime desc
